data.title: Broadway in Cincinnati Production History
data.text:
BROADWAY IN CINCINNATI

Production History at the Aronoff Center

Broadway in Cincinnati has been proud to bring the very best of Broadway to Queen City since the

opening of the Aronoff Center in October 1995. Below you’ll find a complete list of the Broadway tours that graced the original Procter and Gamble Hall stage floor from 1995 until its replacement at the end of the 2022-23 Season.

Tina: The Tina Turner Musical

Anastasia

Tootsie

Hadestown
